body:
### Welcome.

Youth Democracy is an open-source project that aims to build a robust and social tool for analyzing political data. There is large amount of politically relevant information on the internet. Our goal is to integrate, organize, compact and make available all this data to our users. We hope to combine information from social networks (Facebook, Twitter, and Google+), blogs, news agencies and the internet in general. So that users may have a deeper insight and a better outlook towards politics.

Our project is active at [www.youthdemocracy.in](www.youthdemocracy.in)


You could also join our [Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Youth-Democracy/171545239644634).

### Get Involved
Our overall project has been broken down into smaller sub-projects. You may choose the one that most interests you. We welcome your assistance in any of our projects. If you wish to help our development team in other ways, you can join our Facebook Group to discuss your ideas with us.

Current Sub-Projects:-
* Core
    * Server
        * Google App Engine
        * Database Development
        * Facebook Graph
        * Big Data
        * Network Security
        * Natural Language Processing
    * Website
        * Facebook API & Graph
        * Facebook Query Language (FQL)
        * Interface Design
        * Privacy and Security
        * Optimization
* Application's
    * Facebook App
    * Android
    * Windows Mobile
    * iPhone

### Contributors
YouthDemocracy has only one goal to improve political outlook. If you would like to help us in our endeavor or would just like to be involved with this project, join us. We appreciate all your assistance. You can submit new ideas and projects for us to work on. Our Facebook Group exists for us to collaborate.

Join: https://www.facebook.com/groups/projectyouthdemocracy/


Email: editor@youthdemocracy.in
name: Youthdemocracy
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Political reseach and analysis portal built on Google App Engine
